00042 KosmosBroker::KosmosBroker(PropertiesPtr &props) : m_verbose(false), m_no_flush(false) {
00043 
00044   const char *meta_name;
00045   int meta_port;
00046 
00047   m_verbose = props->get_bool("Hypertable.Verbose", false);
00048 
00049   meta_name = props->get("Kfs.MetaServer.Name", "");
00050   meta_port = props->get_int("Kfs.MetaServer.Port", -1);
00051 
00052   m_no_flush = props->get_bool("Kfs.Broker.NoFlush");
00053 
00054   std::cerr << "Server: " << meta_name << " " << meta_port << std::endl;
00055   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient(meta_name, meta_port);
00056 
00057   KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->SetDefaultClient(clnt);
00058 
00059   m_root_dir = "";
00060 }

00071 void KosmosBroker::open(ResponseCallbackOpen *cb, const char *fname, uint32_t bufsz) {
00072   int fd;
00073   String abspath;
00074   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00075 
00076   if (m_verbose) {
00077     HT_INFOF("open file='%s' bufsz=%d", fname, bufsz);
00078   }
00079 
00080   if (fname[0] == '/')
00081     abspath = fname;
00082   else
00083     abspath = m_root_dir + "/" + fname;
00084 
00085   std::cerr << "Open file: " << abspath << std::endl;
00086 
00087   //fd = atomic_inc_return(&ms_uniq_id);
00088 
00092   if ((fd = clnt->Open(abspath.c_str(), O_RDONLY)) < 0) {
00093     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(fd);
00094     HT_ERRORF("open failed: file='%s' - %s", abspath.c_str(), errmsg.c_str());
00095     ReportError(cb, fd);
00096     return;
00097   }
00098 
00099   {
00100     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00101     OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata(new OpenFileDataKosmos(fd, O_RDONLY));
00102 
00103     cb->get_address(addr);
00104 
00105     std::cerr << "Got fd for file: " << abspath << std::endl;
00106 
00107     m_open_file_map.create(fd, addr, fdata);
00108 
00109     std::cerr << "Inserted fd into open file map for file: "<< abspath << std::endl;
00110 
00111     cb->response(fd);
00112   }
00113 }

00119 void KosmosBroker::create(ResponseCallbackOpen *cb, const char *fname, bool overwrite,
00120             uint32_t bufsz, uint16_t replication, uint64_t blksz) {
00121   int fd;
00122   int flags;
00123   String abspath;
00124   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00125 
00126   if (m_verbose) {
00127     HT_INFOF("create file='%s' overwrite=%d bufsz=%d replication=%d blksz=%d",
00128                 fname, (int)overwrite, bufsz, replication, blksz);
00129   }
00130 
00131   if (fname[0] == '/')
00132     abspath = fname;
00133   else
00134     abspath = m_root_dir + "/" + fname;
00135 
00136 
00137   //fd = atomic_inc_return(&ms_uniq_id);
00138 
00139   if (overwrite)
00140     flags = O_WRONLY | O_CREAT | O_TRUNC;
00141   else
00142     flags = O_WRONLY | O_CREAT | O_APPEND;
00143 
00144   std::cerr << "Create file: " << abspath << " " << flags << std::endl;
00145 
00149   if ((fd = clnt->Open(abspath.c_str(), flags)) < 0) {
00150     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(fd);
00151     std::cerr << "Create failed: " << errmsg << std::endl;
00152 
00153     HT_ERRORF("open failed: file='%s' - %s", abspath.c_str(), errmsg.c_str());
00154     ReportError(cb, fd);
00155     return;
00156   }
00157 
00158   {
00159     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00160     OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata(new OpenFileDataKosmos(fd, O_WRONLY));
00161 
00162     cb->get_address(addr);
00163 
00164     m_open_file_map.create(fd, addr, fdata);
00165 
00166     cb->response(fd);
00167   }
00168 }

00174 void KosmosBroker::close(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t fd) {
00175   if (m_verbose) {
00176     HT_INFOF("close fd=%d", fd);
00177   }
00178 
00179   m_open_file_map.remove(fd);
00180 
00181   cb->response_ok();
00182 }

00188 void KosmosBroker::read(ResponseCallbackRead *cb, uint32_t fd, uint32_t amount) {
00189   OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata;
00190   ssize_t nread;
00191   uint64_t offset;
00192   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00193   StaticBuffer buf(new uint8_t [amount], amount);
00194 
00195   if (m_verbose) {
00196     HT_INFOF("read fd=%d amount=%d", fd, amount);
00197   }
00198 
00199   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00200     char errbuf[32];
00201     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00202     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00203     return;
00204   }
00205 
00206   offset = clnt->Tell(fdata->fd);
00207 
00208   if ((nread = clnt->Read(fdata->fd, (char *) buf.base, (size_t) amount)) < 0) {
00209     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(nread);
00210     HT_ERRORF("read failed: fd=%d amount=%d - %s", fdata->fd, amount, errmsg.c_str());
00211     ReportError(cb, nread);
00212     return;
00213   }
00214 
00215   buf.size = nread;
00216 
00217   cb->response(offset, buf);
00218 
00219 }

00225 void KosmosBroker::append(ResponseCallbackAppend *cb, uint32_t fd,
00226                           uint32_t amount, const void *data, bool sync) {
00227   OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata;
00228   ssize_t nwritten;
00229   uint64_t offset;
00230   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00231   int res;
00232 
00233   if (m_verbose) {
00234     HT_INFOF("append fd=%d amount=%d", fd, amount);
00235   }
00236 
00237   if (m_no_flush)
00238     sync = false;
00239 
00240   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00241     char errbuf[32];
00242     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00243     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00244     return;
00245   }
00246 
00247   offset = clnt->Tell(fdata->fd);
00248 
00249   if ((nwritten = clnt->Write(fdata->fd, (const char *) data, (size_t) amount)) < 0) {
00250     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(nwritten);
00251     HT_ERRORF("write failed: fd=%d amount=%d - %s", fdata->fd, amount, errmsg.c_str());
00252     ReportError(cb, nwritten);
00253     return;
00254   }
00255 
00256   if (sync && (res = clnt->Sync(fdata->fd)) < 0) {
00257     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00258     HT_ERRORF("flush failed: fd=%d - %s", fdata->fd, errmsg.c_str());
00259     ReportError(cb, res);
00260     return;
00261   }
00262 
00263   cb->response(offset, nwritten);
00264 
00265   return;
00266 }

00272 void KosmosBroker::seek(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t fd, uint64_t offset) {
00273   OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata;
00274   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00275 
00276   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00277     char errbuf[32];
00278     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00279     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00280     return;
00281   }
00282 
00283   if ((offset = (uint64_t) clnt->Seek(fdata->fd, offset, SEEK_SET)) == (uint64_t) -1) {
00284     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(offset);
00285     HT_ERRORF("lseek failed: fd=%d offset=%lld - %s", fdata->fd, offset, errmsg.c_str());
00286     ReportError(cb, (int) offset);
00287     return;
00288   }
00289 
00290   cb->response_ok();
00291 }

00297 void KosmosBroker::remove(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *fname) {
00298   String abspath;
00299   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00300   int res;
00301 
00302   if (m_verbose) {
00303     HT_INFOF("remove file='%s'", fname);
00304   }
00305 
00306   if (fname[0] == '/')
00307     abspath = fname;
00308   else
00309     abspath = m_root_dir + "/" + fname;
00310 
00311   if ((res = clnt->Remove(abspath.c_str())) < 0) {
00312     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00313     HT_ERRORF("unlink failed: file='%s' - %s", abspath.c_str(), errmsg.c_str());
00314     ReportError(cb, res);
00315     return;
00316   }
00317 
00318   cb->response_ok();
00319 }

00325 void KosmosBroker::length(ResponseCallbackLength *cb, const char *fname) {
00326   String abspath;
00327   uint64_t length;
00328   int res;
00329   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00330   struct stat statbuf;
00331 
00332   if (m_verbose) {
00333     HT_INFOF("length file='%s'", fname);
00334   }
00335 
00336   if (fname[0] == '/')
00337     abspath = fname;
00338   else
00339     abspath = m_root_dir + "/" + fname;
00340 
00341   if ((res = clnt->Stat(abspath.c_str(), statbuf)) < 0) {
00342     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00343     HT_ERRORF("length (stat) failed: file='%s' - %s", abspath.c_str(), errmsg.c_str());
00344     ReportError(cb, res);
00345     return;
00346   }
00347   length = statbuf.st_size;
00348   cb->response(length);
00349 }

00355 void KosmosBroker::pread(ResponseCallbackRead *cb, uint32_t fd, uint64_t offset, uint32_t amount) {
00356   OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata;
00357   ssize_t nread;
00358   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00359   StaticBuffer buf(new uint8_t [amount], amount);
00360 
00361   if (m_verbose) {
00362     HT_INFOF("pread fd=%d offset=%lld amount=%d", fd, offset, amount);
00363   }
00364 
00365   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00366     char errbuf[32];
00367     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00368     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00369     return;
00370   }
00371 
00372   if ((offset = (uint64_t) clnt->Seek(fdata->fd, offset, SEEK_SET)) == (uint64_t) -1) {
00373     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(offset);
00374     HT_ERRORF("lseek failed: fd=%d offset=%lld - %s", fdata->fd, offset, errmsg.c_str());
00375     ReportError(cb, (int) offset);
00376     return;
00377   }
00378 
00379   if ((nread = clnt->Read(fdata->fd, (char *) buf.base, (size_t) amount)) < 0) {
00380     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(nread);
00381     HT_ERRORF("read failed: fd=%d amount=%d - %s", fdata->fd, amount, errmsg.c_str());
00382     ReportError(cb, nread);
00383     return;
00384   }
00385 
00386   buf.size = nread;
00387 
00388   cb->response(offset, buf);
00389 }

00395 void KosmosBroker::mkdirs(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *dname) {
00396   String absdir;
00397   String::size_type curr = 0;
00398   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00399   int res = 0;
00400   struct stat statbuf;
00401 
00402   if (m_verbose) {
00403     HT_INFOF("mkdirs dir='%s'", dname);
00404   }
00405 
00406   if (dname[0] == '/')
00407     absdir = dname;
00408   else
00409     absdir = m_root_dir + "/" + dname;
00410 
00411   String path;
00412   while (curr != String::npos) {
00413     curr = absdir.find('/', curr + 1);
00414     if (curr != String::npos)
00415       path.assign(absdir, 0, curr);
00416     else
00417       path = absdir;
00418 
00419     std::cerr << "Stat'ing: " << path << std::endl;
00420 
00421     if (clnt->Stat(path.c_str(), statbuf) == 0) {
00422       if (!S_ISDIR(statbuf.st_mode)) {
00423         res = -ENOTDIR;
00424         break;
00425       }
00426       continue;
00427     }
00428     std::cerr << "Mkdir'ing: " << path << std::endl;
00429 
00430     res = clnt->Mkdir(path.c_str());
00431     if (res < 0)
00432       break;
00433   }
00434 
00435   if (res < 0) {
00436     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00437     HT_ERRORF("mkdirs failed: dname='%s' - %s", absdir.c_str(), errmsg.c_str());
00438     ReportError(cb, res);
00439     return;
00440   }
00441 
00442   cb->response_ok();
00443 }

00450   String absdir;

00452   int res;
00453 
00454   if (m_verbose) {
00455     HT_INFOF("rmdir dir='%s'", dname);
00456   }
00457 
00458   if (dname[0] == '/')
00459     absdir = dname;
00460   else
00461     absdir = m_root_dir + "/" + dname;
00462 
00463   if ((res = clnt->Rmdirs(absdir.c_str())) != 0) {
00464     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00465     HT_ERRORF("rmdir failed: dname='%s' - %s", absdir.c_str(), errmsg.c_str());
00466     ReportError(cb, res);
00467     return;
00468   }
00469 
00470   cb->response_ok();
00471 }

00477 void KosmosBroker::flush(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t fd) {
00478   OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata;
00479   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00480   int res;
00481 
00482   if (m_verbose) {
00483     HT_INFOF("flush fd=%d", fd);
00484   }
00485 
00486   if (!m_no_flush) {
00487     if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00488       char errbuf[32];
00489       sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00490       cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00491       return;
00492     }
00493 
00494     if ((res = clnt->Sync(fdata->fd)) < 0) {
00495       string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00496       HT_ERRORF("flush failed: fd=%d - %s", fdata->fd, errmsg.c_str());
00497       ReportError(cb, res);
00498       return;
00499     }
00500   }
00501 
00502   cb->response_ok();
00503 }

00517 void KosmosBroker::shutdown(ResponseCallback *cb) {
00518   m_open_file_map.remove_all();
00519   cb->response_ok();
00520   poll(0, 0, 2000);
00521 }

00524 void KosmosBroker::readdir(ResponseCallbackReaddir *cb, const char *dname) {
00525   std::vector<String> listing;
00526   std::vector<String> stripped_listing;
00527   String abs_path;
00528   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00529   int error;
00530 
00531   if (m_verbose) {
00532     HT_INFOF("readdir dir_name='%s'", dname);
00533   }
00534 
00535   if (dname[0] == '/')
00536     abs_path = dname;
00537   else
00538     abs_path = m_root_dir + "/" + dname;
00539 
00540   if ((error = clnt->Readdir(abs_path.c_str(), listing)) < 0) {
00541     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(error);
00542     HT_ERRORF("readdir failed: file='%s' - %s", abs_path.c_str(), errmsg.c_str());
00543     ReportError(cb, error);
00544     return;
00545   }
00546 
00547   for (size_t i=0;i<listing.size(); i++) {
00548          if (listing[i] == "." || listing[i] == "..")
00549            continue;
00550          stripped_listing.push_back(listing[i]);
00551        }
00552 
00553   HT_INFOF("Sending back %d listings", stripped_listing.size());
00554 
00555   cb->response(stripped_listing);
00556 }

00568     abspath = fname;

00576 void
00577 KosmosBroker::rename(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *src, const char *dst) {
00578   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00579   int error;
00580 
00581   if (m_verbose)
00582     HT_INFOF("rename %s -> %s", src, dst);
00583 
00584   String abs_src =
00585     format("%s%s%s", m_root_dir.c_str(), *src == '/' ? "" : "/", src);
00586   String abs_dst =
00587     format("%s%s%s", m_root_dir.c_str(), *dst == '/' ? "" : "/", dst);
00588 
00589   if ((error = clnt->Rename(src, dst)) < 0)
00590     ReportError(cb, error);
00591   else
00592     cb->response_ok();
00593 }
00594 
00595 
00599 void KosmosBroker::ReportError(ResponseCallback *cb, int error) {
00600 
00601   string errbuf = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(error);
00602 
00603   if (error == ENOTDIR || error == ENAMETOOLONG || error == ENOENT)
00604     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILENAME, errbuf.c_str());
00605   else if (error == EACCES || error == EPERM)
00606     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_PERMISSION_DENIED, errbuf.c_str());
00607   else if (error == EBADF)
00608     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf.c_str());
00609   else if (error == EINVAL)
00610     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_INVALID_ARGUMENT, errbuf.c_str());
00611   else
00612     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_IO_ERROR, errbuf.c_str());
00613 }
